snippet: Middle-income countries are doing better at saving premature infants, but blindness and cerebral palsy are on the rise among the babies saved.
abstract: Experts report that middle-income countries in Asia and Latin America are doing better at saving premature infants, but blindness and cerebral palsy are on the rise among the babies saved.
lead_paragraph: Middle-income countries are doing better at saving premature infants, but blindness and cerebral palsy are on the rise among the babies saved.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
